problem_text: Find x if M S is an altitude of \triangle M N Q, m \angle 1 = 3 x + 11, and m \angle 2 = 7 x + 9.
compact_text: Find x if MS is an altitude of \triangle MNQ, m \angle 1 = 3x+11, and m \angle 2 = 7x+9.
annotat_text: Find $x$ if $\overline{MS}$ is an altitude of $\triangle MNQ$, $m\angle 1 = 3x + 11$, and $m \angle 2 = 7x + 9$.
